titleStmt.title: A glasse for the times: wherein is represented the malady and remedy of divisions. / In a sermon preached at Mercers Chappel, April the 7th 1650. By La. Seaman D.D. pastor at Alhallowes-Breadstreet. London.
titleStmt.author: Seaman, Lazarus, d. 1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for John Rothwell at Sun and Fountain in Pauls church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
